org.opendaylight.controller.cluster

Interface DataPersistenceProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataPersistenceProviderMonitor

    public interface DataPersistenceProvider
    DataPersistenceProvider provides methods to persist data and is an abstraction of the akka-persistence persistence API.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteMessages(long sequenceNumber)
      Delete journal entries up to the sequence number

      Delete snapshots based on the criteria

      Persist a journal entry.

    • Method Detail

      • isRecoveryApplicable

        boolean isRecoveryApplicable()
        Returns:
        false if recovery is not applicable. In that case the provider is not persistent and may not have anything to be recovered
